Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: A synagogue built and used by Jewish immigrants from Ethiopia near Rosh Haayin, March 1995, lt is a replica of a synagogue they used to pray in when living in Gondar, Ethiopia.
